title: Breath Of Fresh Air: Viral â€˜Cardano Girlsâ€™ Video Sparks Conversation About The Project
description: Cardano (ADA) has received plenty of criticism over the years, whether itâ€™s ADAâ€™s price performance, its founderâ€™s personality, or its communityâ€™s â€œbeefâ€ with Solana. This time, the projectâ€™s marketing team made the headlines after a viral video of female Cardano users became viral on social media. The â€˜Cardano Girlsâ€™ video has sparked a conversation about the projectâ€™s efforts to reach a broader audience. Related Reading: Cardano (ADA) Eyes Explosive 2000% Bull Run, Targeting $12 And Quadrupling ATH A Breath Of Fresh Air In The Community The â€˜Cardano Girlsâ€™ video was uploaded by Lily Brodi, a content creator and Cardano user, and went viral in hours. The video recreated a popular social media trend of people playfully listing stereotypical practices of a group of people with the phrase â€œWe are (group). Of course, weâ€¦â€ The trend, recreated by millions, including famous personalities like Kim Kardashian, has reached the crypto community. Last week, a â€œCrypto Girlsâ€ version of the trend was uploaded on X, which prompted Brodi to make her own. Brodiâ€™s version approached the point of view of female Cardano investors, with the opening line setting the lighthearted and playful tone: â€œWeâ€™re Cardano girls. Of course, we are real.â€ The list in the video includes how female ADA users â€œtreat themselves with money saved on gas,â€ â€œhave Charles as their phone wallpaper,â€ and â€œbuy $ADA while the men create all the drama.â€ At the time of writing, the viral video had over 1.5 million views on X. Its massive reach resulted in the acknowledgment of Cardanoâ€™s founder, Charles Hoskinson, referred to as â€œCattle Daddyâ€ in the video. Lol, I'm blushing. Thanks for all the support and love — Charles Hoskinson (@IOHK_Charles) March 25, 2024 ‘Cardano Girls’ And Marketing Team Face Criticism The video didnâ€™t go unnoticed by critics, who considered the video to be â€œcringy,â€ while others expressed opinions seemingly based on misogyny. Crypto influencer Peter McCormack replied to the X post stating that the video will be used â€œas torture at Guantanamo Bay.â€ However, the video appears to be well-received by the Cardano and crypto community. Brodi addressed the male detractors in an X post: after the last 24 hours, iâ€™ve realised that a lot of men havenâ€™t felt the warm embrace of a woman — LILY (@lilybrodi) March 26, 2024 Nonetheless, the video opened a broader conversation despite the critics. On one hand, it highlighted how the male-dominated crypto industry can be unreceptive and aggressive to women in the space. On the other hand, it pointed out a crucial issue for Cardano: its â€œunattractiveness.â€ The Need For A New Approach Brodi discussed the videoâ€™s immense impact, as it seemingly brought general interest in the project, with people reaching out to her curious about the Cardano wallet. Despite its technology and the knowledgeable people inside the community, the project doesnâ€™t seem to attract the general user. Brodi, who creates light and informative Cardano-related content, considers that the general content offered can be â€œtoo heavyâ€ and â€œoverwhelmingâ€ to those who know about the industry and even more to those who donâ€™t but want to come in. real talk #CardanoGirls & cardano marketing pic.twitter.com/XePfmHiXGN — LILY (@lilybrodi) March 27, 2024 Cardanoâ€™s marketing problem, as highlighted by Brodi, has often prevented potential users from entering. She suggests that a change in the market strategy is â€œneeded within Cardanoâ€ for broader adoption. Lighthearted, fun, and enjoyable educational content that can be easily consumable can be fundamental for broader adoption. Investors can be attracted to projects that seem easily understandable and approachable. As seen with the memecoin mania, projects can become massive, even if the long-term technology and planning arenâ€™t developed by launch. The crypto community is undoubtedly filled with people who enjoy various content and projects. But â€œbringing light and funâ€ enjoyment is crucial to supporting adoption because, at its core, â€œthatâ€™s what our community is.â€ Related Reading: Hereâ€™s Why The Cardano Price Is Struggling Below $0.7 ADA is trading at $0.64 in the 3-day chart.
